sentences.sContent: That information is not in our possession.
sentences.sCn: 那则信息不归我们所有。

sentences.sContent: How did the painting come into your possession (= how did you get it ) ?
sentences.sCn: 这幅画是怎么到你手上的？

sentences.sContent: The finance company now has possession of the house.
sentences.sCn: 这家金融公司目前拥有这所房子。

sentences.sContent: We didn’t take possession of (= get and start using ) the car until a few days after the auction.
sentences.sCn: 拍卖会过后几天我们才正式拿到那辆车。

synos.tran: 拥有；财产；领地；自制；着迷

phrases.pCn: 被某人占有；属于…；为…所有
使完全占有；转交所有权；给予引渡

words.tran: 占有的；所有的；所有格的；占有欲强的

trans.tranOther: if something is in your possession, you own it, or you have obtained it from somewhere
